fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Day 3 and onward, during the day, you may create a *Savestate* of the game. Saving every piece of information of the current game at that moment. (1 use)
- After creating a *Savestate*, at night, you may load your *Savestate*. Reverting the game back to how it was at that *Savestate*. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You lose your Basic Defense after Night 1.
- You do not get your charges back after reloading a *Savestate*.
